channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The Best Kindle of 2025: Paperwhite, Scribe, or Colorsoft?
item.description: Here’s how Amazon’s ebook readers stack up—and which one might be right for you.

item.title: Interview: Freepik boss tells us the limits of AI, why storytelling matters, and how not to tangle yourself up in a copyright nightmare
item.description: I spoke to Freepik's CEO and co-founder about AI, creativity, and what it means to be a creative professional today.

item.title: Huawei is back in Europe - and it wants to help take your small business to the next level, with AI at the center
item.description: Huawei brings integrated SME solutions to European customers, combining intelligence features, simplified deployment models, and expanded partner support.

item.title: The algorithm failed music
item.description: This is The Stepback, a weekly newsletter breaking down one essential story from the tech world. For more on how to break free of the algorithm and discover things you love, follow Terrence O'Brien. The Stepback arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 8AM ET. Opt in for The Stepback here. How it started I used […]

item.title: Ikea just took over your smart home
item.description: Hi, friends! Welcome to Installer No. 105, your guide to the best and Verge-iest stuff in the world. (If you're new here, welcome, hope you've recovered from the clocks falling back, and also you can read all the old editions at the Installer homepage.) This week, I've been reading about David Ellison and Common Crawl […]

item.title: Logitech MX Master 4 review: the master returns
item.description: The Logitech MX Master 4 brings welcome additions to one of the best mice in the business.

item.title: Comment jouer à tous vos jeux sur la ROG Xbox Ally (Xbox, Steam, Epic etc) ?
item.description: Sortie il y a quelques semaines seulement, les ROG Xbox Ally et Ally X permettent d'accéder à tout un tas de magasins et launchers uniquement accessibles grâce à Windows. Mais comment tirer parti de cette polyvalence ?

item.title: PNY’s microSD Express Card is one of the fastest Nintendo Switch 2 cards I’ve tested, and it costs the same as the competition – but there’s one big catch
item.description: The PNY microSD Express Card is a fantastic way to upgrade your Nintendo Switch 2 storage capacity.

item.title: Gen AI is becoming a major security worry for all firms - here's how your business can stay safe
item.description: Behavioral cybersecurity and analytics seems to be the way forward as GenAI "superusers" are accessing all of our data.

item.title: Petit projecteur, petit prix : le Wanbo Dali 1 sous Android TV coûte seulement 69 € pendant le pré-Black Friday
item.description: Avec ses dimensions contenues et son poids de 900 g, le Wanbo Dali 1 fait partie des picoprojecteurs les plus légers du marché. En plein pré-Black Friday, ce modèle avec Android intégré est proposé à 69 euros par PC Componentes, tandis que d'autres e-commerçants l'affichent à plus de 100 euros.

item.title: SteelSeries Arctis Nova Elite Review: Redefining the ‘Premium’ Gaming Headset
item.description: When a headset costs as much as this one, it better be freaking fantastic.

item.title: 5 fitness trackers without distracting screens – and where to buy them right now
item.description: Focus on your workout with these anti-smartwatch fitness trackers, from Whoop to Oura.

item.title: Wales vs Argentina free streams: How to watch Autumn Internationals 2025, TV Channels, Team News & Preview
item.description: All the ways to watch Wales vs Argentina live streams online, with the returning Louis Rees-Zammit among the replacements for the 2025 Autumn International.

item.title: Black Friday en avant-première sur les tablettes tactiles : la sélection des meilleures offres sur les iPad, Samsung Galaxy Tab, Xiaomi Pad et autres
item.description: Les tablettes tactiles ont certes perdu en popularité, mais peuvent toujours avoir leur utilité. Notamment pour certaines tâches, comme le dessin numérique, avec un stylet. Pendant l'avant-première du Black Friday, nombre de ces dalles sont en promo.

item.title: Black Friday laptop deals are live: I've hand-picked the 20 best from Amazon, Dell, Newegg, and more
item.description: Need a new laptop? Here's what I'd buy with my own cash if I were shopping in the early Black Friday sales this weekend.

item.title: Black Friday 2025 : les offres pleuvent chez Amazon & Co, nous avons retenu les meilleures offres en avant première
item.description: De nombreux e-commerçants ont pris de l'avance sur le Black Friday. On trouve déjà de belles remises sur de nombreux produits Tech. Nous suivons les offres les plus intéressantes en temps réel pour vous présenter une sélection des meilleures promotions tech du moment, incluant smartphones, ordinateurs, téléviseurs, objets connectés et accessoires. ...
